text: Maharram Gasimli () is a Doctor of Sciences in Philology, professor, Vice Director of Azerbaijan National Academy of Sciences' Literature Institute,http://science.gov.az/institutes/31 chairman of Azerbaijan Ashugs' Union (03.03.2016 to present),"Məhərrəm Qasımlı Aşıqlar Birliyinin yeni sədri seçilib". karabakhmedia.az. 3 mart 2016. http://karabakhmedia.az/main/4301-meherrem-qasimli-ashiqlar-birliyinin-yeni- sedri-sechilib.html. İstifadə tarixi: 3 mart 2016. literature scholar, folklore scholar, Meritorious Scientist, and poet.Savalan Talıblı. “Xalq folklorunu bilirsə, o xalqı heç kim ələ ala bilməz”: Məhərrəm Qasımlı: “Bizim mədəniyyətin açarı sazdır”: [Filologiya elmləri doktoru, professor] //"Kaspi".- 2008.- 22 avqust.- S. 14. № 150(1857) Maharram Gasimli was born in 1958 in the village of Alakol in Tovuz, Azerbaijan. He graduated from Azerbaijan State University with a major in philology. He currently works in the Literature Institute of the Azerbaijan National Academy of Sciences. He is Director of the Folklore Division of the Institute.http://www.aznews.az/news/cemiyyet/90778.html In 1992, he was appointed Vice Director of Academics for the Institute.http://anl.az/down/meqale/respublika/2013/mart/299608.htm He was in the working group to prepare the ten-volume History of Azerbaijani Literature. He is the editor-in-chief of the Folklore and Ethnography Journal which has been published since 2003. He compiled the Novruz encyclopedia in 2008 and was its chief scientific editor. He published his book "Ozan-aşık sanatı" in Turkey in 2010. He akso writes poetry under the pseudonym Orxan Paşa. He published a poetry book in 2004 entitled "Sənə sözüm var". He is currently working on the "Ozan-Aşıq" encyclopedia. He is the principal secretary of Azerbaijan Ashugs' Union.http://www.unesco.org/culture/ich/doc/src/NGO-90327-10.COM-ICH-09.pdf He was appointed as chairman of the union in 2016.https://sputnik.az/culture/20160303/404016238.html He has published more than 250 academic articles and 2 monographs in Azerbaijan.
